note.p: Soldier. Entered the East India Company’s service in 1820. Served in the first regiment light cavalry of the Bombay Military Establishment. Lieutenant, 1824; captain, 1834; major, 1841; lieutenant-colonel, 1850. Retired with the rank of lieutenant-colonel in 1850.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/804/88/29)
London, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2017)
